mapper.insert: insert into payment(payment_code, truck_code, menu_code, amount, total_price, payment_class,payment_telephone) values(to_char(sysdate,'yymmdd')||to_char(payment_sequence.NEXTVAL,'fm000000'), #{truck_code},#{menu_code},#{amount}, #{total_price},#{payment_class},#{payment_telephone})
mapper.select: select a.*, b.menu_name from payment a left outer join menu b on (a.menu_code = b.menu_code) where to_char(a.payment_date,'YY-MM-DD') = to_char(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD') and a.truck_code = #{truck_code} and (a.payment_class = 3 or a.payment_class = 4 or a.payment_class = 5) order by a.payment_date asc

select a.*, b.menu_name from payment a left outer join menu b on (a.menu_code = b.menu_code) where to_char(a.payment_date,'YY-MM') = concat(concat(#{inputYear}, '-'), #{inputMonth}) and a.truck_code = #{truck_code} and (a.payment_class = 3 or a.payment_class = 4 or a.payment_class = 5) order by a.payment_date asc

select a.*, b.menu_name from payment a left outer join menu b on (a.menu_code = b.menu_code) where to_char(a.payment_date,'YY') = #{inputYear} and a.truck_code = #{truck_code} and (a.payment_class = 3 or a.payment_class = 4 or a.payment_class = 5) order by a.payment_date asc

select a.*, b.menu_name from payment a left outer join menu b on (a.menu_code = b.menu_code) where to_char(a.payment_date,'YY-MM-DD') >= #{inputFirstDate} and to_char(a.payment_date,'YY-MM-DD') <= #{inputLastDate} and a.truck_code = #{truck_code} and (a.payment_class = 3 or a.payment_class = 4 or a.payment_class = 5) order by a.payment_date asc

select * from payment where to_char(payment_date,'YYYY') >= #{inputFirstYear} and to_char(payment_date,'YYYY') <= #{inputLastYear} and to_char(payment_date, 'd') = ${day} and truck_code = #{truck_code} and (payment_class = 3 or payment_class = 4 or payment_class = 5) order by payment_date asc

select * from payment where to_char(payment_date,'YY-MM-DD') >= #{inputFirstDate} and to_char(payment_date,'YY-MM-DD') <= #{inputLastDate} and to_char(payment_date, 'HH24') = ${hour} and truck_code = #{truck_code} and (payment_class = 3 or payment_class = 4 or payment_class = 5) order by payment_date asc
select telephone from customer where telephone = #{telephone}
